text: Namaia is a genus of primate related to lemuriforms that lived in Africa during the early middle Eocene. It was originally thought to be an early simian, but was later aligned with the djebelemurids. == Notes == == References == === Literature cited === * Category:Prehistoric strepsirrhines Category:Eocene primates Category:Fossil taxa described in 2008 Category:Eocene mammals of Africa Category:Prehistoric primate genera
title: Namaia
